title: Bus Mania - Car Parking Jam
description: A challenging parking puzzle game where players navigate through colorful parking lots, solve puzzles, and ensure every passenger gets to their matching ride. Features unique gameplay mechanics and brain-teasing challenges.

title: Idle Construction 3D
description: 3D construction simulation game with idle mechanics and progression systems. Players build and manage construction projects with realistic 3D graphics and engaging gameplay.

title: Dive Fever
description: Fish & Sushi Time! Explore the sea, catch clown fishes, sharks, and even narwhals! Make them into sushi and sell to hungry customers. Earn lots of money and become the most successful billionaire!

title: Mini Chef
description: Have the most satisfying cooking animation. Manage the pocket kitchen, and earn lots of money with your mini chefs! Features smooth animations and engaging cooking mechanics.

title: Screw Mania - Tool Box Jam
description: A puzzle game where players solve tool box jams by strategically moving screws and tools. Features challenging puzzles and satisfying mechanics.

title: Dragon Match 3D
description: 3D matching puzzle game with dragon-themed graphics and engaging gameplay mechanics. Features stunning visuals and challenging levels.

title: Blobby Rush
description: Created realistic Jelly simulation for the Blobby Rush game with advanced physics and fluid dynamics. Features unique blob mechanics and smooth animations.

title: Pearl Rush
description: Exciting pearl collection game with beautiful underwater graphics and engaging gameplay mechanics. Features smooth controls and challenging levels.

title: Stuffed Toy 3D
description: 3D stuffed toy simulation game with realistic physics and engaging gameplay. Features beautiful graphics and satisfying toy interactions.

title: Idle Home Makeover
description: Idle home renovation game where players transform houses with beautiful makeovers. Features progression systems and satisfying renovation mechanics.

title: Sentiment-Driven NPC Interaction System
description: Dynamic NPC interaction system for Unity-based games using NLP for sentiment analysis, speech synthesis, and Reinforcement Learning to adapt NPC behavior based on player interactions.

title: Dragon Car Challenge
description: Designed Car Controller system with bezier paths for smooth vehicle movement and challenging gameplay mechanics.

title: Base Runner Controller
description: Implemented versatile Base Runner Controller with stacking movements and advanced character control systems.

title: Strategy Game Module
description: Created comprehensive module for strategy games with AI opponents and complex decision-making systems.

title: Multiplayer Game Development
description: Developed multiplayer games using Photon networking system with real-time synchronization and player interactions.

title: AR/VR Experiences
description: Created immersive augmented reality experiences using Unity3D and Unreal Engine for mobile platforms.

title: Playable Ads Optimization
description: Optimized playable ads for maximum speed and performance across modern mobile devices with advanced compression techniques.

title: AI NPC Demo
description: Demonstration of emotionally responsive NPCs using sentiment analysis and speech synthesis.

title: Game Development Showcase
description: Showcase of various mobile games developed using Unity3D and Unreal Engine.

title: Performance Optimization Demo
description: Demonstration of game performance optimization techniques and profiling tools.

title: SDK Development
description: Developed SDKs for backend-as-a-service, streamlining integration processes for new game features.

title: Machine Learning Integration
description: Integrated machine learning models for dynamic game content generation and player behavior analysis.

title: Cross-Platform Development
description: Developed games for multiple platforms including iOS, Android, and console systems with optimized performance.

title: Team Leadership Projects
description: Led development teams, mentored junior developers, and managed project timelines for successful game releases.
